thread.section_title: ClickForBlinds recenzje | Opinie konsumentów na temat ClickForBlinds | www.clickforblinds.com
thread.title: G Pieters
thread.title_full: ClickForBlinds został oceniony przez G Pieters

author: G Pieters
title: G Pieters
text:
Was a little bit reluctant as the website wasnt as sleek as some competitors, and shipped from abroad could be logistically more challenging.
However as it turned out the product is great, very nice quality and no issues with anything . the office people were very helpful in making sure the measurements were fine as it had to fit a box bay window. Thanks!
